Vernon can read well um Mr Jordan worked
when he was in college in the Summers he
worked as a chauffeur chauffeur for a
man who was um the sort of oldtime
segregationist
and once he he was serving this man and
his family and well he actually
uh He Came Upon uh Mr Jordan in his
looking at reading a book and he was
shocked and he sort of announced to his

had anybody who worked for him whom he
really thought could actually read a
book I mean you know reading a few

can read and so he that always struck

underestimated him you know Vernon can
read and so he always said if I ever
write a book about myself that's going
to be my title so that's that's what
that was it was about uh his sort of I
guess triumph over the kinds of
attitudes that suggested that he was not
supposed to do anything but be a servant
an illiterate servant at that
